thread.section_title: Nengun Performance評価／レビュー | お客様は Nengun Performanceの評価／レビューをしました。 | nengun.com
thread.title: Chris Baker
thread.title_full: Nengun Performance について 投稿者 Chris Baker

author: Chris Baker
title: Chris Baker
text:
Having never ordered from Japan before i was abit skeptical. I emailed the guys over at Nengun for some more information before i made the purchase. They were extremely helpful throughout the whole process with regular updates of the order and shipping.
The item arrived quite quickly and well packaged and exactly as described/listed.
Would certainly recommend Negun Performance to all my friends and will definitely use them again in the future
